snippet.title: Country Road VR Official Trailer 2020
snippet.description: This is our official 2020 trailer for Country Road VR - The Virtual Petting Farm complete with real-life animal and nature sounds. Now available on Steam! This is a simply VR experience originally designed to help treat individuals with dementia.  Please note that a VR headset and appropriate computer graphics card is required. We recommend HTC Vive, Valve Index or Oculus Rift. Enjoy!
